name: Pollen Disaster
description:
In this very beautiful summer vacation you as a teenager, decide to visit your grandparents who live in the countryside, on your arrival, your grandfather suggests that you go and get a nice bouquet in the garden for your grandmother.
 You accept without thinking, the problem being that you are highly allergic to pollens (which come from flowers) you will therefore have to survive as hard as you can outside in this pollen storm. Make sure to avoid them or else you will end up being knocked out. So go and gather as much flowers as you can to make your grandmother happy !


This game was made for the GREAT SUMMER GAME JAM 2021
